title: Expenditures
context: §201-11 Expenditures. Expenditures by the department of business, economic development, and tourism, except as otherwise provided by this part, shall be made on the basis of vouchers approved by the director of business, economic development, and tourism, or by a subordinate so authorized by the director. [L 1955, c 264, pt of §2; RL 1955, §28A-12; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §§10, 25; am L 1963, c 2, §3; HRS §201-11; am L 1987, c 336, §7; am L 1990, c 293, §8]
